action.action-desc: Mr. Pappas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To appropriate funds for LIHEAP during a Federal Government shutdown.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keep the Heat On Act of 2025.

section.header: Funding for LIHEAP during a Federal Government shutdown
section.text: Out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, there is appropriated for making payments under section 2602(b) of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 (42 U.S.C. 8621(b)) during any period of a lapse in discretionary appropriations during fiscal year 2026 such sums as may be necessary to make payments under such section at a rate equal to the rate of payments in the corresponding month of fiscal year 2025.
